Don't listen to the other comments, the quality is pretty awful. Maybe if the file was like half the size it would be understandable, but for 820mb it is complete crap(and I only have a 19" monitor). Yes, it is watchable, but it is nowhere close to "good" or "great" quality like other people have said.

That said, it is a very good movie that should definitely be watched, but I would highly suggest a different torrent if video quality matters at all to you.
